theorem axler_exercise_6_13 :
  (â€–vâ€– ^ 2 = âˆ‘ i, â€–inner v (e i)â€– ^ 2) â†” v âˆˆ submodule.span ğ•œ (Set.range e) := by sorry

open scoped BigOperators

variable {E : Type*}
variable [SeminormedAddCommGroup E] [InnerProductSpace â„ E]
variable {m : â„•} (e : Fin m â†’ E) (h : Orthonormal â„ e) (v : E)

  (â€–vâ€– ^ 2 = âˆ‘ i, (Inner.inner â„ v (e i)) ^ 2) â†” v âˆˆ Submodule.span â„ (Set.range e) := by sorry
